Headline: විකෘති ආශාවන් නිසා වෛද්‍ය සැමියා මරා දැමූ ඕස්ට්‍රේලියාවේ ලාංකික වෛද්‍ය බිරිය (video)

comments.comment: As I listen to her, I strongly feel that she is not honest. She as an educated lady who lives in a developed country, she could have avoided this situation. She could have easily left him without killing him. There are hundreds of psychologists in Australia and she could have easily consulted one. Police department is not as same as police back in SL, and she would have gotten the 100% justice if she would have reported the issue without killing him.
Agree with you. Are you certain she helped shaving legs only?
Totally agree wit your comments. She would have left him without killing him. Two children needs a father. Crocodile tears in front of a camera.
Yes
Yes

Itsamazing how people comment without having the basic knowledge on psychiatric disorders. These kind of people who have distorted minds are very dangerous. They will make sure that their partner will not leave them alive. There are so many Sri Lanka women who suffer but live with those men because of fear. When they snap it ends in disaster. I was told that this doctor ( Husband ) has been of abnormal mentality even in medical college. Some have wondered how he survived even that long. With these kind of people living in SL who would jump to blame the woman , Its goo that she decided to stay in Australia. She will have a better life among better understanding people in Australia than here in SL where she will be branded a murderess.
Asian Immigrants get only 3rd class treatment in aus.

Are you in Australia? How do you know? Law is same to anyone here. Especially violence against women is not tolerated. She had lot of options, she didn't have to kill him. She got the sympathy vote. I am sicking tired of how Sri Lanka is put down as a country for their own benefit. When Aussies see any documentary about Sri Lankan culture and beauty they get a shock. We never knew Sri Lanka is so beautiful. That's how they comment. Sri Lanka is not perfect but I blame our own people for putting out country down.

If you have fisrt class treatment then why you support SL team when they play with Aus? You are angry with them for how they silently discriminate you. That is the utter truth. Westerners do silent discrimination on Asians. This common even in UK or Canada..
not true

එයාගේ ජීවිතේ අසාදාරනයක් උනානම් ඒකට සාදාරනය උනාට අපට කමක් නැහැ. හැබැයි මිනීමැරුම් චෝදනාව නිසා ලංකාවට පිටුවහල් වෙයි කියල තමන් උපන් උගන්නල ලොකුමහත් කරපු රට අපකීතිමත් කරපු එක නම් කාපු පතේ පැහැරුව වගේ වැඩක් https://www.change.org/p/peter-dutton-mp-allow-dr-chamari-liyanage-to-remain-in-australia

ආගමක් තියෙන විත්තියවත් මේ අය දන්නෙ නෑනේ. රාගයට බෙහෙත් ලෙස කොමෙන්ට් දාන අයත් කියන්නෙ සයිකැස්ටික් කෙනෙකුට පෙන්නන්නලු. දේශනාවෙ තියෙනවා විරේක බෙහෙත් ගැන, සමහරුන⁣ට විරේක බෙහෙතට බඩ විරේක වෙනවලු, සමහරුනට එහෙම වෙන්නෙ නැතිලු. නමුත් මේ ධර්මය තමයිලු පරිපූර්ණ, විරේක බෙහෙත, ධර්මය නැමැති විරේක බෙහෙත බොන කෙනාගෙ රාග, ද්වේශ මෝහ ඉතුරු නැතිව විරේක වෙනවා ස්ථිරයි. කොයිතරම් රාගයක් උනත් හිරු දුටු පිනි වගේ වෙනවා.

කිසිවක් මතක නෑ, කියන දෙයත් මම විශ්වාස කරනවා, මෙහෙමයි, නිල් බලන අයට අමනුස්ස බැල්ම වැටෙනවා, මේ අමනුස්ස පිරිස මෙයාට දරාගන්න බැරි රාගය ඇතිකරනවා. ඒ අයගෙ ආහාරය අපෙන් පිටවෙන දේවල්. මේ සිත අපේම අපේම වගේ සිතුනට, අමනුස්සයනට බොහොම පහසුවෙන් සිතට අදහස් දෙන්න පුලුවන්, අතරමැදි අවස්ථාවෙදි අමනුස්සයා කියලා තේරෙද්දිම එයා දෙන හැඟීමට කීකරුවෙනවා, තව දුරටත් ධර්ම මාර්ගයෙ ගියොත් තුන්වැනිවයි බේරෙන්නෙ.
The other woman is 17 years. That makes her underage and essentially a child. The way she acts in front of the camera is infuriating.

Extracted from above link ++××++×++++++++++ If deported to Sri Lanka, Chamari will face the risk of being killed. In a strongly patriarchal country like Sri Lanka, a woman who kills her husband would not likely be protected by the law. In Sri Lanka 60% of women are abused or raped, according to statistics, and less than 3% of the men are ever brought to justice. That is very frightening and goes against Australia’s democratic principles and sense of fair play and equality for all. +++++++++++++++
අනේ දෙවියනේ... අපේ @Malathiekalpana143p ටත් ඔය ගනයේම සැමියෙක් හිමිවේවා. මේකිට තියෙන මඟුල් විසේ හැටියට, අපේ කොල්ලෙක්ට පාලනය කරන්න බැරිවෙයි.
